src:
Jokićeva briljantnost za slom Orlanda - iz okreta, s jedne noge, preko Vučevića s velikim lukom (VIDEO)
Srbin ponovo najbolji, Denver slavio na Floridi

03 Nov 2019


Pobedi se u zube ne gleda, kakva god ona bila. A, u okršaju Orlanda i Denvera gde je preovladavala tesna defanzivna borba, bolji su bili Nagetsi – 91:87.

Posle možda i neočekivanih poraza od Dalasa i pogotovo Nju Orleansa, Denver je imao spreman odgovor i zaustavio slom ekipe u pravom trenutku. I opet sve zahvaljujući Nikoli Jokiću! Dosadili smo vam verovatno sa pričom da je Jokić bio najbolji u pobedničkim redovima, ali takvo je stanje stvari. Najbolji centar sveta proveo je na parketu nešto više od trideset jednog minuta i svoje veče upotpunio sa 20 poena (7/14 iz igre, 3/7 za tri), te sedam uhvaćenih i četiri podeljene lopte. Posle nešto sporijeg prvog poluvremena, Jokić je na otvaranju trećeg kvartala ubacio dve trojke kojim je izvršio pritisak na domaćina, ali se igrači Orlanda nisu uplašili. Naprotiv, uzvratili su udarac i nakratko poveli s poena razlike. Nagetsi nisu odustajali, pa se njihova navalentnost isplatila. Usledila je serija 13:2 kojom su gosti uzeli prvo vođstvo na četiri minuta do odlaska na poslednji mali odmor. Lopta je počela da se kreće više i brže, a Nagetsi su mnogo više počeli da napadaju obruč i Orlando nije mogao da izdrži toliki pritisak.



Kada je bilo najpotrebnije, ponovo se na parketu oglasio Nikola Jokić. Navikli ste da mađioničar iz Sombora uvek ima spreman trik, a ovog puta iz šešira izvukao je šut koji je potpuno slomio Medžike! Šut iz okreta, s jedne noge, preko Nikole Vučevića s velikim lukom! Bilo je to na tek nešto manje od dva minuta do kraja utakmice, u situaciji kada su Nagetsi vodili s 82:81. Jokićeva briljantnost pokazala je da Orlando nije bio spreman na tako nešto, pošto je usledio drastičan pad koji je značio samo jedno – poraz.
I pored trijumfa, ostaje da Denver i dalje traži svoj napadački ritam. Izabranici Majkla Melouna su i sinoć šutirali samo 37 odsto iz igre, odnosno 32,1 odsto za tri poena. Orlando jeste odigrao dobru odbranu, ali Denver ipak godinama važi za elitni napadački tim koji živi od brzih kretnji lopte i igrača. Zbog toga su prošle noći razliku napravili bolji procenti šuta sa linije slobodnih bacanja i defanzivni odgovor Nagetsa na Orlandovu postavku, što je dovelo do toga da domaćin puca tek 20,7 odsto van linije 7,25 metara...



Od Jokića efikasniji je jedino bio Džamal Mari s 22 poena (7/15 iz igre), dok su dvocifreni bili još samo Geri Heris sa 13 i Monte Moris s 10 poena. Kod Orlanda Nikola Vučević je ubeležio 24 poena (10/16 iz igre), uz sedam skokova i dve asistencije. Aron Gordon je upisao 21, a Evan Furnije 11 poena.




NBA – rezultati

Detroit – Bruklin 113:109/Dramond 25 – Irving 20/
Orlando – Denver 87:91/Vučević 24 – Denver 20/
Memfis – Finiks 105:114/Morant 24 – Buker 21/
Milvoki – Toronto 115:105/Adetokunbo 36 – Lauri 36/
Vašington – Minesota 109:131/Bil 30 – Vigins 21/
Golden Stejt – Šarlot 87:93/Paskal 25 – Bejkon 25/
Portland – Filadelfija 128:129/Lilard 33 – Horford 25/

text:
Jokic's brilliance for the Orlando breakdown - from a turn, with one leg, over Vucevic with a big bow (VIDEO)
Serbia's Best Again, Denver Celebrated in Florida

03 Nov 2019


Winning your teeth doesn't look what it is. And, in the Orlando and Denver clashes where tight defensive combat prevailed, the Nagets were better - 91-87.

After perhaps unexpected defeats to Dallas and especially New Orleans, Denver had a ready answer and stopped the breakdown of the team at the right time. And again thanks to Nikola Jokic! We probably bore you with the story that Jokic was the best in the winning ranks, but that is the situation. The best center in the world spent just over thirty minutes on the floor, completing his night with 20 points (7/14 from the game, 3/7 for three), seven catches and four split balls. After a slightly slower first half, Jokic threw two threes in the opening third quarter to put pressure on the home side, but the Orlando players were not scared. On the contrary, they reciprocated the blow and briefly led off the points of difference. The Nagets did not give up, so their worthiness paid off. The series was followed by a 13: 2 run, with the guests taking the first lead for four minutes before leaving for their last little break. The ball started moving more and faster, and the Nagets started attacking the hoop much more and Orlando couldn't withstand that much pressure.



When it was most needed, Nikola Jokic appeared on the floor again. You are used to the Sombor magician always having a ready trick, and this time he pulled a shot from the hat that completely broke the Medzhiki! One-legged shot from Nikola Vucevic with a big bow! It was just under two minutes until the end of the game, in a situation where the Nagets led with 82:81. Jokic's brilliance showed that Orlando was not ready for such a thing, as there was a drastic fall that meant only one thing - defeat.
Despite the triumph, it remains that Denver is still looking for its attacking rhythm. Michael Meloun's selectors shot just 37 percent from the game last night, up 32.1 percent from three points. Orlando did play good defense, but for many years Denver has been considered an elite offensive team that lives off the fast movement of the ball and players. That's why last night's difference was made by better shot percentages from the free throw line and Nagets' defensive response to Orlando's lineup, which resulted in the home side shooting just 20.7 percent from the 7.25 meter line ...



Jokal was only more efficient than Jamal Marie with 22 points (7/15 from the game), while only Gary Heris with 13 and Monte Moris with 10 points were double digits. At Orlando, Nikola Vucevic scored 24 points (10/16 from the game), with seven rebounds and two assists. Aaron Gordon tallied 21 and Evan Furney had 11 points.




NBA - Results

Detroit - Brooklyn 113: 109 / Drummond 25 - Irving 20 /
Orlando - Denver 87: 91 / Vucevic 24 - Denver 20 /
Memphis - Phoenix 105: 114 / Morant 24 - Booker 21 /
Milwaukee - Toronto 115: 105 / Adetokunbo 36 - Lauri 36 /
Washington - Minnesota 109: 131 / Bill 30 - Wiggins 21 /
Golden State - Charlotte 87: 93 / Pascal 25 - Bacon 25 /
Portland - Philadelphia 128: 129 / Lillard 33 - Horford 25 /
